description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14652.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14608.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14649.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: Land's End is a small fishing village with such a small population it doesn't
appear on any maps.  Two large warehouses and two homes are the only standing
buildings.
14574.name: Entrance to Land's End

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14611.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: This trail is heavily travelled.  You can easily see signs of
others who have made this trip before you.  The sand is a
glistening white with brown smears from mountain dirt.
14514.name: Sandy trail

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14629.name: Sea of Swords, South Paradise Isl

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14605.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: The stones you are walking on were gathered from local sites
about the village.  Laid by Dwarves, the stones are almost
seamless.  The air is very cool here between the houses.
14542.name: Malo main

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14640.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14635.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: The sandy trail you have been following leaves the beach and
enters the mountains.  Well maintained, the mountain trail is
easy to follow and has obviously been smoothed to make your
travel easier.
14516.name: Mountain trail

description: Near the twin towers you have a really good view of the city
wall and it's southern gate.  The wall is approximately 12 feet
tall.  The gate is made of metal and has large spears protruding
from the top to stop "wild animals" from climbing the barrier.
14564.name: Ancient road

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14606.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
The docks of Paradise Island is to the north.
14614.name: {rSouth{B of the {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B Docks{x

description: The West Tower is a dark gray color.  Several gargoyles are
crouching along the rim of the tower..protecting the residents
from danger.  Stooping down you can see into the tower and out
the other side.
14558.name: Before the West Tower

description: All about you are growing tiny little plants that will one day
feed the population of the village.
14582.name: Garden path

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14643.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the east.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the west, you see endless sea.
14662.name: Sea of Swords, West Paradise Isl

description: The bridge you are travelling on appears to have been constructed
using the same material and methods used to build the ancient
road you are travelling upon.
14555.name: South side of bridge

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14621.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14616.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14632.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: >From here you can see the ocean and any incoming vessels.
Two homes stand nearby as well as a rowboat and three fishing
vessels drydocked for the season.  Perhaps the fishing is bad.
14576.name: Ocean View

description: You are walking behind the homes and quite by accident have
discovered a child's toy.  The toy is a wooden doll, complete
with dress and straw hair.  It is lying in the mud and appears
to have been trampled.
14586.name: Behind the buildings

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14641.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The trail you are following travels alongside a row of palms
growing on the beach.  The palms provide shade and relief from
the sun's warm rays.
14511.name: Palm trail

description: A large tapestry is hanging on the east wall.  The tapestry
shows a mountain scene, with a river running through a valley
and into a large cave mouth.  Several arrow slits provide access
for both air and light.
14563.name: East Tower

description: A very large tapestry covers a hole in the wall.
The closer you get to the river the bushier it becomes.  Squeezing
past some of the bushes along this path is a sticky situation.
There are 1 inch thorns on some of them.  Be careful.
14592.name: Bushy path

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the east.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the west, you see endless sea.
14661.name: Sea of Swords, West Paradise Isl

description: Scattered about the fallen bricks and timbers from the roof are
bones and broken furniture.  The huge hole in the west wall shows
signs of fire.  The bricks scattered about the room appear to have
been caused by a very large explosion.
14560.name: West Tower

description: The beautiful mountain clearing you are standing in is surrounded
by extremely high mountains...some of which are covered with snow.
14525.name: Mountain clearing

description: The trail is passing over exposed bedrock and is very slippery.
Be careful or you could slide to the bottom and get some nasty
trail burns.
14530.name: Slippery trail

description: The water rushes toward the beach causing large waves and
a riptide which threatens to pull your vessel towards the west.
14503.name: Rough waters at the beach

description: You are standing on a sandy beach complete with seashells,
palm trees and sand crabs.  To the south you see a line of
palm trees standing next to and before two huge mountains.
14504.name: The beach

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the east.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the west, you see endless sea.
14658.name: Sea of Swords, West Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14655.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14610.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14628.name: Sea of Swords, South Paradise Isl

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14604.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: Malo Main goes down the middle of the village.  It is covered
with native stones and although short, it has the makings of
a Better Streets entry.  The stone buildings on each side of the
street are warm and toasty..with smoke pouring from the smoke
stacks and yellow light coming from the shuttered windows.
14539.name: Malo Main

description: This wooden door has a circle with a large
letter M in the middle of it.
This ancient, overgrown road was made years before the village
was constructed.  It's age is so great you can see where trees
grew through it's center, were cut down and made into firewood.
14551.name: A very old road

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14631.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: This trail has had recent traffic.  You can see indentions in
the sand from someone's footsteps.  Two small running grooves
indicates that the previous traveller had a small cart.
14512.name: Sandy palm trail

description: The steep trail you are following cuts between a huge mountain
to the west and two smaller mountains to the east.  A little
further down the trail you can see a clearing of some kind.
14517.name: Mountain trail

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14647.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14644.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The boulders have been stacked to block travel on the ancient
road.  Large stakes, sharpened and pointed toward the wall,
keep travellers on the road.
14568.name: Base of Boulders

description: This is the only "road" in Land's End.  The most accurate
description would be a path.  On both sides of you stand large
warehouses where tradegoods are stored.  A few fishing nets
hang from nearby trees and a drying rack produces that strong
fish smell which spreads through the air.
14575.name: Land's End Road

description: The mountain clearing is carpeted with flowers of every color.
Some of the flowers are extremely rare, however, all of them
are beautiful and would make a wonderful addition to any home.
14524.name: Flowers everywhere

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14630.name: Sea of Swords, South Paradise Isl

description: The grassy mountain clearing is open to the sun and is full of
the smells of a high mountain meadow.  A large swath of purple
flowers carpets this side of the clearing.
14520.name: Clearing

description: Once again the path has come close to the fence.  Looking closely
you discover several large holes dug under the fence.  If you
were a little smaller you could have squeezed through those
holes and gotten to the other side.
14593.name: Near the fence

description: The soft ground here shows evidence of recent travel.  Some of
the many marks in the ground were obviously made by booted
soldiers while the unshod footprints appear to have been made
by nonhuman feet.  The prints are elongated and end in talons.
14589.name: Outside the West Tower

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14618.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14600.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14634.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: A small path travels along the roadblock to the west.  Skirting
along sharpened stakes the path meanders amoungst and besides
the huge boulders stacked precariously across the ancient road.
14569.name: Path along boulders

description: This large warehouse was built to contain tradegoods for all
of the sailors and merchants expected to use Ocean View as a
port of call.  Unfortunately, no one seems to know exactly
where Ocean View is.
14578.name: Large Warehouse

description: The rushing water to your south has been used to irrigate the garden. Several
large clay containers are gathered along the river for this very purpose.
14585.name: Along the river

description: To the west is the village well, while all about you the native
stone buildings create a wonderful setting for this family life.
14543.name: Village street

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14638.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: The mountain meadow where you are standing has knee high grass,
yellow flowers and is surrounded by the short shrubs of the area.
14521.name: Mountain meadow

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14637.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: A thin layer of dust covers the floor of this tower.  The markings
in the dust indicate that someone, or something, has passed this
way recently.  The room is mostly bare.
14562.name: Inside the East Tower

description: The ancient road widens as it drives straight as an arrow in a
southern direction.  Although the road is cracked and crumbling
at the edges it still provides the best travelling surface you
have ever seen.
14556.name: Ancient road

description: To the northeast you can see an island in the middle of the Sea of
Swords.  Besides that it is endless oceans.
14613.name: Near Paradise Island

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14653.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: You have reached the end of the street.  Several lovely houses
surround you and prevent you from travelling further in this
direction.  Looking past the homes you see a twenty foot tall
wall ringing the village proper.
14547.name: End of the street

description: The beach is quickly approaching and you had better take in
your sail or you'll run aground.  From here you can see three
huge mountaintops and a few trees next to two or three buildings.
14502.name: Approaching land

description: Several large red stains appear along this area of the ancient
roadway.  Upon closer examination you are able to determine that
the stains are old blood.  Surely a battle has been fought here!
To your right and left short squat towers flank the road.  Small
doors, low to the ground, provide entrance to the towers.  The
tower construction is as ancient as the road.
14557.name: Red stained road

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14648.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: This tower is rather small and has a dark, ominous feel about it.
The roof has caved in, allowing the fresh mountain air to
penetrate into every secret corner.  The entrance is to the east.
The west wall has a large gaping hole in it's center.
14559.name: West Tower

description: BEWARE.  This gate is to remain closed at all times.  The evil must be
controlled.  The evil must be contained.
This huge metal gate appears to have been built much later than
the ancient road it guards.  A close look at the door reveals
a tiny, hand written sign attached to the gate.
14565.name: Before the gate

description: This massive steel gate has spears along it's top.
You are standing at the edge of a high mountain clearing.  You
are completely surrounded by mountains, some of which are capped
by white snow.
14522.name: Mountain view

description: You have walked quite a distance from your vessel.  If you
look backwards you can see your anchored ship bobbing in the
surf.  The path you are following begins to curve into the
palms and toward the mountains.
14506.name: Water's Edge

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14603.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: This small path leads you away from the ancient road, along
the boulders and into the sharpened stakes set to keep you on
the road.
14571.name: A small path

description: This wilderness trail has none of the comforts of home.  Strange
noises and unseen movement has begun to work on your nerves.
You are approaching the end of the trail...at the top of a snow
capped mountain.
14535.name: Wilderness trail

description: The garden continues to parallel the mountain river.  While walking
through the carrots you glance south into the river and see the
remains of a wooden bridge washed ashore.  The bridge is flimsy
and ill made and obviously was not meant to be permanent.
14584.name: Garden along the river

description: The wide trail leads into a small village of seven buildings.
Made from natural stone, the one story buildings are simple yet
effective.  A large garden area borders the river bisecting
the valley to the south.  Two huge towers on the other side of
the river appear to be guarding a gate leading to the valley.
14537.name: Village entrance

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14657.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: To the west is a small village composed of six or seven buildings
and to the south of the village you see a garden, however, it's the
river which attracts your attention.  You'll have to get a better
view down the trail.
14531.name: Village view

description: The stone house is warm and cozy.  Several thick blankets
hang on the walls and a small fire is burning in the fireplace.
Yellow candles light the room.  The room does not have anything
of value in it.
14540.name: Stone house

description: The door is solid as a rock.  It has triple
locks and should give you safety to the world.
The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the east.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the west, you see endless sea.
14659.name: Sea of Swords, West Paradise Isl

description: The sandy path you are following is slowly curving towards the
beach and the palm trees.  Past the palms, to your west, are
the tops of several buildings.  Smoke spirals into the air
and you can almost smell grilled fish.
14507.name: Sandy path

description: Unexpectedly you have come across several skeletons and what
would appear to be the site where several people were killed.
Strips of cloth are embedded in the mud and stuck to bushes
and the yellowing bones of two or three skeletons are scattered
everywhere.
14591.name: Slaughter site

description: >From this vantage point you see the river running west and east. Very cold
water hits the side of the bridge and throws cold spray into your face.
The wall encircling the village proper also encircles a long stretch of
the river.
14554.name: Middle of bridge

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14645.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: You are standing at the entrance to Malo Village.  A small
valley community of Humans, Dwarves, and Elves living together
in wilderness harmony.  The village is alive with movement,
everyone going about their business while the farm animals do
what comes natural.
14538.name: Malo Village

description: This beautiful brown house has columns on each side of the
door and it has a tile roof.  A large picture window at the
rear of the house reveals a stunning view of the large
mountain to the north of you.
14544.name: Brown House

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14624.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: This small path has seen little traffic in recent times.  There
are obvious signs of use by small animals, tracks, droppings, etc..
however, no man sized creatures have passed this way for years.
The river is rushing past you and flows through the large hole in
the fence to your right.  Perhaps a large rain washed it away?
14597.name: Small path at river's edge

description: This trail leads from a mountain field to the bottom of a valley.
The rich dirt of the trail is smooth and regular..signs that
someone is maintaining the trail.
14527.name: Mountain trail

description: You are passing through the hole in the wall which surrounds the
village.  At first you thought that the river had created this
hole but upon closer inspection it is obviously the work of man.
14599.name: Hole in wall

description: The tracks you see are well defined and
were obviously made by an unshod foot.
The toes are extremely long and end with
curved talons.
The garden ends here at the village wall.  The crops have been
trampled and there's nothing here but a large mud patch.  A large
mud patch with scores of tracks.
14588.name: Garden's end

description: The old road leads south while a small path leads westward
into a large garden patch.  To the south the road crosses
a river with an ancient bridge.  Two towers can be seen on
the other side...near the gated wall surrounding the village.
14552.name: Garden and Old Road

description: +            This area has been converted and adapted by           +
+                             Gapcio                               +
+    modified, debugged (?:) slightly enhanced and balanced by     +
+                             jaceks                               +
+                                                          july'96 +
At long last....land hoooo!  To the south, the pinacle of a large
mountain has attracted your attention.  A sandy beach awaits your
landing...trees wave in the wind and birds of many colors fly
high above the land beyond the beach.
There is a small (Glowing) (Humming) tablet.
14501.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: Nothing special about this home except the fact that it's not
special.  Even the fireplace is bare.  Where you might expect
to see a display you see instead blank wall.
14548.name: Simple home

description: The wilderness is so disorganized.  Trails are rough and rocky,
bushes with thorns crowd the trail and even the flowers are not
as soft and lovely as the ones along the main trail.
14534.name: The Wilderness

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14654.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14642.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14656.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14622.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: This small home has been built from the bones of whales and
other small sea animals.  Barnacles would feel right at home
here...if the home were under water of course.
14580.name: Small home

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
You see a boat house to the north.
14623.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: You are walking between the palm trees when you notice several
large monkeys..weighing about 200 pounds each glancing down
at you from their perches.  They appear to be sizing you up.
14508.name: Palm path

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
You see a boat house to the north.
14625.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: The mountain field you are standing in is open to the sky
and is framed by tall mountains.
14526.name: Opening to the sky

description: You are standing along the east wall of the East Tower.  Tracks
in the soft earth lead to the wall nearby and towards the river.
14596.name: Outside the East Tower

description: A very large tapestry covers a hole in the wall.
The view from this small mountaintop is very special.  You are
closer to the heavens than you'll ever get.  The view from here
reveals much about the valley far below.  Below you a river can
be seen bisecting the valley floor.  A small valley and garden
as well as the bridge crossing the river are completely surrounded
by a ten or twelve foot high wall.  Two towers protect the valley
entrance to the enclosure.
14536.name: Mountain Top

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14627.name: Sea of Swords, South Paradise Isl

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14612.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: The yellow sand is deep and makes walking hard.  Several large
biting flies have found their dinner by lunching on your exposed
skin.  The palm trees wave gently in the wind..their brown husks
scraping a lovely tune.
14505.name: Sandy beach

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14626.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: You are standing at a crossing of two different trails.  The
trail to the east climbs a short mountain and ends at a lookout.
The trail going down to the valley floor appears to be the most
travelled route.
14528.name: Cross trails

description: The path comes to an abrupt halt.  The boulders curve inward,
towards the city, and with the aid of the sharpened stakes all
about you travel in this direction has been effectively cut off.
14570.name: A path

description: This small trail travels into the mountains and the wilderness
which surrounds it.  The rocky trail shows no signs of recent travel.
14533.name: Small trail

description: Climbing high into the mountains you approach a clearing, encircled
by bushes your avenues of retreat are limited.  Either go forward
or back down the mountain.
14518.name: Steep trail

description: The path has now led you through several rows of beans, squash, and melons.
14583.name: Garden alley

description: >From this part of the garden you have an excellent view of the
river as it passes through the fence.  A huge section of the
12 foot high fence is missing above the river.  Perhaps a massive
rain washed that section of the fence away?
14587.name: River View

description: This tiny path goes to the fence then parallels it.  Following
the path would take you near the river.
14590.name: Path near fence

description: The trail is coming to an end.  To the northwest you can see
three or four buildings nestled within the palms of the beach.
At least one of the buildings is a warehouse.
14513.name: Near the end

description: The sandy trail leads west and east.  You are standing at the
base of a huge mountain.  If you listen closely you can hear
the crashing of the waves upon the beach to the north of you.
14510.name: Cross Trail

description: Hundreds of palms block your sight of the ocean.  Their graceful
height and delicate fronds make a wonderful screen to the sun's
hot rays.
14515.name: Palm view

description: The ancient road you are on is buried under a huge pile of
boulders placed strategically across the road to block travel.
14567.name: Ancient way

description: You are approaching the end of the palm path.  Several buildings
to the north of you appear to be both warehouses and living
quarters.  The smell of drying fish is evident and a small fishing
boat has been drydocked for repair.
14573.name: Path's end

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14633.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14646.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
You can see the beach north.
14619.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14639.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14651.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: You are on the river which flows south of Malo Village.  To
the south of you are two short towers and of course the wall which
surrounds the village.  To the east is a large hole in the fence.
The river runs through that hole.
14598.name: On the river

description: You are standing at the beginning of a long valley.  Snowy
mountains surround this lush valley and low clouds help reduce
the temperature to a chill.  To the west of you is a small village.
14532.name: The Valley

description: The rushing water of the river drowns out nearly all sounds.
You are alone with one of the forces of nature.  Looking across
the river you can make out the vague outlines of village homes.
14594.name: Near the river

description: The path has come to an end.  The high wall of boulders curves
inward and effectively traps you against the sharpened stakes.
14572.name: End of path

description: The village well is covered by a small awning and has a very
long rope to reach to the bottom of the well.
14546.name: Village well

description: You are standing on the south side of the gate leading to
Malo Village.  The ancient road continues to the south but is
blocked by a rough wall of ill placed boulders.  On each side of
the road are sharpened stakes driven at an angle into the ground.
The stakes are obviously meant to keep travellers on the road.
14566.name: Other side of the gate

description: This massive steel gate has sharpened spears along it's summit.
The mountain clearing is all about you.  You are standing in
the middle of a mountain meadow surrounded by snow capped
mountain peaks.  Flowers of every color brighten the area.
14523.name: Clearing's Center

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14607.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: Garden way is simply a path leading through or near the vegatables
planted by the villagers.  All about you are sprouting plants.
14581.name: Garden way

description: A loving hand has created this home.  Fine detail has been given
to all wooden items and the furniture was made by a master.
14541.name: Gray Stone house

description: This wooden door has a circle with a large
letter M in the middle of it.
The trail has led you to a mountain clearing.  Circled by bushes
and a few shrubs this grassy clearing shows several signs of
recent travel by a great number of people.
14519.name: Mountain clearing

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the west.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south and east, you see
endless sea.
14636.name: Sea of Swords, East Paradise Isl

description: You are standing before the slim East Tower.  Unlike the West
Tower this tower has been whitewashed.  Painted every three feet
are red stylized crosses.  Again, unlike the West Tower this
tower does not have gargoyles about it's rim.
14561.name: Before East Tower

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14617.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: Paradise Island is getting bigger to the northeast.  The rest of
the compass is empty sea.
14615.name: Near Paradise Island

description: You have entered a general store laden with wilderness supplies
and everyday items necessary for survival.  If you look closely,
you'll find a little of everything.
14550.name: A general store

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14609.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: In an obvious effort to overshadow the brown house nearby,
the owners of this home have applied an expensive dye to
their home, turning it a brilliant green color.
14545.name: Green house

description: This lovely wooden home stands so near the water that it's
occupants have the most beautiful view you've ever seen.  Several
crabs have made their home outside the seaward window.
14577.name: Oceanview Home

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the south.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the north, you see endless sea.
14650.name: Sea of Swords, North Paradise Isl

description: The bridge is made of local material finely worked with artistic
designs of flying creatures.  Gargoyles and flying lions decorate
the entire bridge.
14553.name: The Bridge

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the north.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the south, you see endless sea.
14620.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{B near {YP{Ra{Yr{Ra{Yd{Ri{Ys{Re {YI{Rs{Yl{Ra{Yn{Rd{B{x

description: This trail is cutting between several mountains and is very steep.
A few shrubs line the trail as well as some beautiful flowers.
14529.name: Down trail

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the east.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the west, you see endless sea.
14660.name: Sea of Swords, West Paradise Isl

description: The trail you are following is covered with palm fronds and
monkey droppings.  To the south of you a huge mountain dominates
the view.  The glare is terrific at the mountain's peak from the
sun beating down upon the snow.
14509.name: Palm trail

description: You are standing in the largest warehouse on this side of the
ocean.  The echo of your steps bounces back to you very quickly.
When the weather turns incliment the local fishermen drag their
vessels into this warehouse for safety.
14579.name: Largest Warehouse

description: You are standing at the edge of the river.  Several markings on
the ground show where boats have been pulled ashore, however,
you see no signs of them now.  The river passes through the 12 foot
tall fence to your west.  A large section of the fence is gone,
allowing passage into the countryside.
14595.name: River's edge

description: Endless sea in all directions.  The currents of the Sea of Swords
flow below you, and there is no land in sight.
14601.name: {BOn the {CS{bea {Bof {CS{bwords{x

description: The golden coast of Paradise Island follows the Sea of Swords to
the east.  The clear blue waters of the Sea of Swords float around
you, and along the island shore.  To the west, you see endless sea.
14663.name: Sea of Swords, West Paradise Isl

description: The last house of this village has a large porch and a huge fireplace.
It appears to be large enough to hold several people at the same time.
14549.name: Last house

description:
This BIG monkey must weigh at least 200 pounds. It is covered with black
fur and has the ugliest teeth you have ever seen.
14501.room_name: A BIG monkey looks at you with interest.
14501.name: the BIG monkey~

description:
This Elf does not appear to be very prosperous. His violet eyes look you
over as he tries to decide if you are a client or a salesman.
14502.room_name: An Elven merchant checks his wares.
14502.name: the Elven Merchant~

description: This merchant has the Eye of the Tiger. "Welcome my friend," he says.
14503.name: the Dwarven Merchant~

description:
This man is only four feet tall but has a powerful body.  His arms reach
almost to his calves.
14504.room_name: The Halfdwarf Merchant looks at you.
14504.name: the Halfdwarf Merchant~

description: Many of the merchants you have seen throughout your life resemble this man.
14505.room_name: A large Human Merchant stands ready to sell you.
14505.name: the Human Merchant~

description:
This adventurer is a largish, oafish, boy with the largest ego you've ever
seen.  His ego is writing checks his character will never be able to cash.
14506.room_name: Madboy the Adventurer sneers at you.
14506.name: Madboy the Adventurer~

description:
This soldier has an alert look about him.  With his pointed beard and
sharp sword the security he provides comes mostly from his presence.
14507.name: the Bearded Soldier~

description:
This soldier greets you with a bared blade. I don't think you'll be
sneaking up on him.
14508.room_name: The Alert Soldier glares at you suspiciously.
14508.name: the Alert Soldier~

description: Without looking in his eye you have no idea how tough he would be.
14509.room_name: This Sleepy Soldier doesn't see you.
14509.name: the Sleepy Soldier~

description:
This female Watcher is one of those cultist who protect the rest of the
world from those they determine are evil.
14510.room_name: The Watcher is looking for evil.
14510.name: the Watcher~

description: This fat pig is very hungry. He eats just about ANYTHING.
14511.room_name: A fat pig is rooting around for food.
14511.name: the fat pig~

description:
The dog looks back at you.  After a few moments it sits up..
puts a cigar in it's mouth, lights it, and asks, "So..what's up bub?"
14512.room_name: A dog sits here wagging it's tail.
14512.name: the dog~

description:
This chicken is so skinny it WOULDN'T provide enough meat for a soup.
        ************ IT ESCAPE FROM KFC BAR !!! *************
14513.room_name: A scrawny chicken is scratching for something.
14513.name: the chicken~

description:
This guy looks like an advertisement for a wilderness clothing company.
>From his buckskins to his fur cap he fits the part.
14514.room_name: A Human Man goes about his business.
14514.name: the Human Man~

description:
She appears to be distracted by some inner thought. Although she seems
to be in good health, her eyes are puffy and red.
14515.name: the Human Woman~

description: The Elven Man looks at you intently before continuing on his way.
14516.room_name: An Elven Man is here, looking for something.
14516.name: the Elven Man~

description: Looking into her eyes causes you great fear.
14517.room_name: A beautiful Elven Woman paces back and forth before you.
14517.name: the Elven Woman~

description: Stand back!  She's about to blow!!!
14518.room_name: The Dwarven Woman is smacking her fist in her hand.
14518.name: the Dwarven Woman~

description: He looks back at you, then dismisses you as unimportant.
14519.room_name: A large Dwarven Man walks by you.
14519.name: the Dwarven Man~

description:
This goblin must be a shock troop.  He is HUGE. Standing 6' tall and weighing
about 250 pounds his bite will be worse than you would think. He is lightly
armed and armored, doesn't wear boots, and has claws and talons with which
to fight.
14520.room_name: The Goblin Warrior raises his hand to strike you.
14520.name: the Goblin Warrior~
